Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Reroute at Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: 18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Halsted, Cermak, Damen, 188th, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: Northbound 34 South Michigan buses are temp. rerouted via 131st, Eberhart, 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th and Michigan: due to street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Eberhart, 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th Michigan and over regular route, due to street blockage near 130th/Indiana.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
